Question: After his death, the vessel MV Robert Hunter owned by the environmental action group Sea Shepherd was renamed MY ****.
Hints: In the film this person (who portrayed himself and performed numerous stunts) mistakes some CIA agents for poachers.
On 14 November 2007, this person was awarded the adjunct professorship posthumously.
No charges were filed; according to one journalist, this person told officials he would not repeat the action.
